editorialSummary.text: Classic hotel with free Wi-Fi & breakfast, plus 2 restaurants, a bar & an exercise room.

text.text: It is a nice hotel but slightly over priced as most of the rooms are not bad is spacious according to the the money there charging 8 to 10000 in normal days and 15000 to 20000 in peak season their charge for a room recharge it will move and this is what we don't like it and the food is and drinks a British expensive there if you want to enjoy the food and drink you can walk down the length they are many bars and foods restaurants

text.text:
Located on Civil Lines close to Prayagraj station and a lot of shopping options on a hustle bustle street. The building stands out as a beautiful structure amidst all the commercial properties. The property has a proper 4* feel with well maintained interiors and well trained staff.

Stayed in the Deluxe room and it was outrageously spacious with a big bed, sofa bed, 3 seater dining and a desk without even cramping the room. The staff was courteous and helpful, working with smiles (no one was rude like some reviews mention). We were staying with a small baby and had a lot of demands which were taken care of with smiles.

The food is good, the spreads are limited but everything was well prepared (we didn't get stomach upsets or acidity like most hotel foods do) and the taste was good as well.

Overall a good stay, would myself stay here for any future trips and recommend people travelling to Allahabad as well

text.text:
I have stayed in the best hotels of India. Kanha Shyam is always on the top of the list of best stays/experiences ever. This time I also gave my family this experience.

After smooth reservation, they were extremely accommodating and allowed us to check in as early at 7.30 am.

Room was clean, beautiful & stylish. The staff were really helpful and courteous. Food quality and taste was fantastic. Hotel Taxi was too good.

We were really pleased with our stay at this hotel. I hope to be back for a longer visit in the future.

Special thanks to Mr Pranav Dubey for his efficient and delightful help.

editorialSummary.text: Warmly decorated rooms & suites in a relaxed hotel offering a restaurant/bar & breakfast.

text.text:
Very comfortable rooms with all luxury amenities. The check in process was so easy with the efficient front desk. Food at the restaurant was also tasty.( had dinner and breakfast) There were variety of food and the restaurant staff was also ready for any assistance. Dont remember the name of the lady staff at the restaurant who was helping and also explaining about the food, of course we asked abt it. Very polite and helpful.
Really enjoyed the stay at this Hotel and sure will recommend.

text.text: Great ambiance, stay, comfort & hospitality. A hotel cum home where you feel staying again and again. It is located in the heart of the city & the food is very sumptuous U can plan your party or any celebrations. without second thought..

originalText.text: Great ambiance, stay, comfort & hospitality. A hotel cum home where you feel staying again and again. It is located in the heart of the city & the food is very sumptuous U can plan your party or any celebrations. without second thought..

text.text: We held our wedding events here and outstation guests were accomodated in the hotel as well. The hotel management went above and beyond to accommodate all our requests and never saying no to anything. The decor for the rooftop haldi event was outstanding in particular and the food was complimented by all. Special thanks to Piyoosh bhaiya (Manging Director) who just doesn't say no to any requests and was personally involved to ensure that the wedding was grand success.

Special thanks to Piyoosh bhaiya (Manging Director) who just doesn't say no to any requests and was personally involved to ensure that the wedding was grand success.

text.text: Food is not up to the mark as per the rate, cost is high and not tasty, spring roll was very spicy n sour in taste whereas in Alfredo pasta there was not penne pasta, it was a mix of macroni n twisted pasta and it tasted more like the maggie cheese pasta available in the market. Overall the food is not good.

Overall the food is not good.

text.text:
There is no parking space here. If there is any wedding or event planned on the day you are arriving, you will have to park the vehicle on the other side of the road.

The person at the reception was not very attentive, we had to carry our own bags till room, and the key was not working.

Rooms are good and clean though.

editorialSummary.text: Airy, simply furnished rooms in a laid-back hotel offering a gym, a food court & free Wi-Fi.

text.text:
Pathetic experience during our stay. We have conducted a workshop-cum-training program for government officials here for three days. Location wise it is beside the Allahabad Railway station, and 24 hours you can hear the engine honking. Rooms size is adequate but most of the room in 1st floor is dampened. Stinking smells in the room. No provision of cupboard inside the room. The hotel don’t provide toiletries complementary one have to pay for that. On the first day I faced water logging in the bathroom. Bathroom doesn’t have tap water provision, only shower present.
The conference and buffet food arrangement  is good. Some of the staffs are cooperative and helpful.
I recommend hotel must work on the room part as it is under the polo tower group. I have stayed in the north east part of the country in Polo Tower properties and never have such a pathetic experience. Certain renovations are required.
Overall speaking our guest were also not satisfied during their stay.

text.text:
Nothing fancy - Just a basic hotel with necessities done right at a good budget.
Great location with erickshaws available. Booked a room with breakfast included, food was decent.
Decent service.
Bed linens, condition of room etc wasn't too good or posh by any means. Bare basics done right.

originalText.text:
Nothing fancy - Just a basic hotel with necessities done right at a good budget.
Great location with erickshaws available. Booked a room with breakfast included, food was decent.
Decent service.
Bed linens, condition of room etc wasn't too good or posh by any means. Bare basics done right.

text.text:
Worst of all hotels across India. This hotel doesn't have basic knowhow of hospitality. Generally hotels allow early check-in if rooms are available however this hotel refused despite of having empty rooms. The logic is that if someone comes and pay more cost then the room can be given to the other person. Rooms are not at all good. Lots of train noise inside the rooms. My wife wanted to use washroom desparately and she requested for a room for 10min, hotel staff refused for the same as well. They were adamant that checkin can be done only at 1pm and check out at 10am. There is no waiver. When I asked them to cancel the booking and refund me the amount, hotel refused for the same as well.
If you want to have a piece of mind and safe and enjoyable stay at Prayagraj then stay away from this hotel or you might be in a tough situation like me and waste your money and time. I wasted 3hrs and INR4000/- with this hotel.

text.text:
Pro - Clean and comfortable bed, all tv channels, excellent reception and housekeeping staff. Excellent location, Good food.

Cons - old infrastructure with defective locks, broken lockers, broken washbasin, defective ac remote systems, open parking at railway parking. Highly overpriced.

editorialSummary.text: Warm rooms & suites in an informal hotel featuring a coffee shop & a restaurant, plus a bar.

text.text:
Hotel is located in one of the residential areas in Allahabad.
Rooms were quite spacious and service was good too, although water could have been cheaper, as they were providing water at ₹53/litre.
Food was good, they had in house cafe, restaurant and a bar.

One of the biggest pro of the hotel location is that it is located just 2.5kms from The Ghats and local transportation was easily Available for sight seeing.

editorialSummary.text: Warmly decorated rooms in a laid-back hotel featuring an understated restaurant & event space.

text.text: A fantastic play to stay in. The hotel is well furnished and the facilities are top notch. One will fully enjoy true luxury in this hotel. All services are provided starting from three meals a day to cleaning every day.

originalText.text: A fantastic play to stay in. The hotel is well furnished and the facilities are top notch. One will fully enjoy true luxury in this hotel. All services are provided starting from three meals a day to cleaning every day.

text.text: A bit of a disaster. Stayed in 3 rooms. The first room had noise from the kitchen downstairs till 3am. The next room they sprayed with toxic cockroach repellent which I ended up smelling the whole night. I read the bottle the next day, and it said "do not smell." So who knows what kind of damage this did to my physical health. The third room was fine. The staff was by and large incompetent, and the waiting staff took it to a whole other level. But all the staff was friendly and was incompetent with a smile. I would rate the hotel 7-8 if I didn't have problems with the rooms. They were otherwise clean and pleasant.

text.text: My stay at the Millennium Hotel was nothing short of fantastic. The staff were incredibly welcoming and accommodating, the room was spacious and well-appointed, and the amenities were top-notch. The hotel's central location made it convenient to explore the city. I highly recommend the Millennium Hotel for a luxurious and comfortable stay. Can't wait to return!

originalText.text: My stay at the Millennium Hotel was nothing short of fantastic. The staff were incredibly welcoming and accommodating, the room was spacious and well-appointed, and the amenities were top-notch. The hotel's central location made it convenient to explore the city. I highly recommend the Millennium Hotel for a luxurious and comfortable stay. Can't wait to return!

text.text:
The stay was so pleasant. I went their with my family and enjoyed every moment. The rooms and washrooms were cleaned regularly and very well maintained, staff are helpful, hotel is located at a nice place on the main road with good parking space. Breakfast was good.
For lunch and dinner we preferred to go at the opposite veg restaurant as they cook very delicious food at reasonable price.
Allahabad/Prayagraj is a happening place for me because the stay had been smooth and good.

text.text: Stayed for 1 night . Left next day in the evening. Clean rooms although the carpets need to be updated. Excellent service, well you always enjoy room service in India, the restaurant in the hotel dishes up some great vegetarian food. Only negative being the hotel's proximity to the high court, the traffic is intolerable , with black coats streaming everywhere and ignoring the law and parking on the street. Requesting the hotel management to please install trash cans outside the hotel , know its the government's reaponsibility , but we can make a start after all our country' s cleanliness is our responsibility.

editorialSummary.text: Low-key lodging offering a lively pub, a 24/7 coffee shop & a multi-cuisine restaurant, plus a gym.

text.text: Our stay at Milan Palace was cozy and comfortable.  They have kept the rooms super clean. Things are well organized here. We had breakfast included in our stay. They have a wide range of food served for breakfast and everything that they served was tasty and yummy. Staff is polite and helpful. They made our stay Memorable! Thank you to the entire team of Milan Palace for all the efforts 🙏

text.text:
This is a budget hotel but the location is very good and handy to big market place. There is a family store and also Bikanerwala eatery. Very handy location to various amenities.
The management needs to improve on cleanliness of corridors. Guests had left soiled dishes with leftovers outside their rooms and nobody cleared them until next morning. The corridors stink and look ugly with several soiled plates left outside.

text.text: Hotel has great vibe . Everything was satisfactory. I felt that charges are higher than usual. But that's not a big deal. It was quite comfortable

originalText.text: Hotel has great vibe . Everything was satisfactory. I felt that charges are higher than usual. But that's not a big deal. It was quite comfortable

text.text: This hotel is disgusting. The rooms smell really bad, when we asked to get the smell checked out the said they are all this way. I asked them to mop the floor and they brought a 30 year old mop and made the smell even worse. Service is terrible, asked for extra towels and they said no. Asked for a room air freshener twice and never got it. I’d rather sleep in the car, if you’re a tourist from another country trust me you do not want to stay here. Location is pretty decent.

text.text:
My recent stay at this hotel was quite underwhelming. To begin with, the absence of basic toiletries in the bathroom was frustrating. It's disappointing when a hotel doesn't provide even the essentials.

Furthermore, the breakfast options were extremely limited, making it difficult to find something suitable. Given the price I paid, I expected a more varied and satisfying breakfast experience.

Lastly, the cost of the stay seemed excessive when compared to the overall quality of the hotel. It felt like I was paying a premium for a lower-class experience.

In summary, the lack of toiletries, limited breakfast choices, and the high cost relative to the hotel's quality made my stay less than enjoyable. I'd advise exploring other options.

editorialSummary.text: Simple quarters, some with sitting areas, plus 2 eateries, breakfast & parking.

text.text:
Nice place in the heart of city, ie Civil Lines. Well maintained hotel. Good ambiance of hotel as well as its Restaurant. Veg n non veg options in the menu.
Rates are little bit on higher side. Food quality and service satisfactory, if not excellent. A separate Bakery house.
Parking available at the front inside and outside premises

text.text: We dined at this establishment, and it made quite an impression. The entrance was grand and attractive, featuring a charming gift shop on one side and a delightful bakery on the other. The restaurant itself was located on the first floor and boasted a fantastic ambiance. The service was prompt, with helpful servers guiding us through the menu. The flavors were enchanting, and the chefs exhibited their culinary prowess. We indulged in dishes like paneer and assorted naan, leaving our taste buds tingling with delight. Don't miss the opportunity to experience it for yourself. The drinks were excellent, and it offered great value for the money. We look forward to revisiting soon, appreciating the commendable service and the wonderful staff.

Beautiful view of the river from the hotel premises and balcony.
Location is good. Staff behaviour is extremely polite and the service is quick.
The price of the food is reasonable, veg items are delicious and the restaurant service is quick.

Overall, we had a pleasant stay however, I wish to stay here at least for a day to enjoy the evening by the river side and take a boat tour to Sangam.

text.text:
A lovely place to stay if you are in Prayagraj. It is a government property and has big rooms and all amenities for the visitors.

This is situated on the river banks with magnificent views and long lawns.

The staff are hospitable and courteous.

The restaurant is an added advantage for this stay. The staff are very nice and the food extra special.

It is situated in that part of the city which has not much to offer for occasional shoppers and or entertainment seekers.

The hotel however is a good place for staying with family.

places.name: places/ChIJtTl-HtzKmjkRAYQC3POmpr0
places.formattedAddress: A/2/D, Lal Bahadur Shastri Marg, opp. GPO, Civil Lines, Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh 211001, India
places.adrFormatAddress: A/2/D, Lal Bahadur Shastri Marg, opp. GPO, Civil Lines, Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh 211001, India
places.shortFormattedAddress: A/2/D, Lal Bahadur Shastri Marg, GPO, Civil Lines, Prayagraj

editorialSummary.text: Straightforward rooms featuring flat-screen TVs in a modern venue offering free breakfast.

text.text:
Worst and pathetic experience in this hotel.

Starting with Staff:
1. Receptionist does not even know how to manage things, they keep you waiting to provide basic needs like bedding and all. In fact i saw, there was a delay in Room check-in for many families over there when i was at reception. Staff is rude(specially Receptionist Santosh over there), he doesn't even know how to speak and accept their mistake of making things delayed.
2. Stealing: One of the hotel staff stole the stola of one of my family member and we caught her while she was roaming wearing it. Informed the hotel about the same and they provided us back.

Food:
3. Food is good but late service of bringing the food at the table makes a bad experience of having lunch over there.
In all
Rooms:
4. Most of the washroom of the rooms are smelly and had to call house keeping time to time for the freshener.

In all above 1 good thing was Mr. Tiwari - Manager , he was co-operative throughout and embarrassed at the same time due to his staff behaviour. He is courteous and sensible .
So, This star is for him only.
Location of the hotel is good.

However, overall experience was very-very bad.
I really do not recommend this hotel to stay.

text.text:
Pathetic hotel worstever services. Rusted fittings and mirror in washroom no fridge in room as they show in their room details on all websites. No shower gel no moisturizer they provide dove shampoo pouches for washroom. Unprofessional staff like staff of cheap hotels in front of railway stations. No buffet for breakfast in you include in your booking only poori sabji is provided as breakfast. Worst over stay in this price range. Stay away from this hotel if you want a good and pleasent stay. They are not even provide facility and services like a normal Oyo hotels but charging for rooms as 3 or 4 star property.

In last my experience is pathetic

editorialSummary.text: Warm quarters in a relaxed hotel offering an outdoor pool, a restaurant & a spa, plus free parking.

text.text:
Location:- Situated in the heart of Prayagraj, the Grand Continent Hotel and Restaurant boasts a prime location, making it convenient for both business and leisure travelers.

Accommodation:- The hotel offers a range of accommodation options, from comfortable rooms to luxurious suites, catering to various preferences and budgets. The rooms are spacious, well-appointed, and designed for utmost comfort.

Dining:- The restaurant serves a delectable array of culinary delights, ranging from local specialties to international cuisine. Whether it's a hearty breakfast buffet or an intimate dinner, guests can expect a gastronomic experience that delights the senses.

Overall Experience:- Grand Continent Hotel and Restaurant provides a seamless blend of comfort, convenience, and luxury. Whether traveling for business or leisure, guests can expect a memorable stay characterized by excellent service, top-notch amenities, and an inviting ambiance.

Dining:- The restaurant serves a delectable array of culinary delights, ranging from local specialties to international cuisine. Whether it's a hearty breakfast buffet or an intimate dinner, guests can expect a gastronomic experience that delights the senses.

Overall Experience:- Grand Continent Hotel and Restaurant provides a seamless blend of comfort, convenience, and luxury. Whether traveling for business or leisure, guests can expect a memorable stay characterized by excellent service, top-notch amenities, and an inviting ambiance.

text.text:
Vikash Agarwal, an esteemed alumni of NIFT and the visionary founder of Khadow, wholeheartedly recommends Hotel Grand Allahabad. Positioned strategically opposite Khadow on SP Marg, this budget-friendly accommodation option caters to travelers seeking comfort and affordability. With rates averaging around 5000 rupees per night, the hotel ensures a pleasant stay without compromising on quality.

Guests at Hotel Grand Allahabad benefit from its prime location, offering convenient access to Khadow and other attractions. Vikash's endorsement, coupled with his Level 8 Google reviewer status, adds a layer of trust and credibility to the hotel's reputation for excellence.

Hospitality is at the forefront of the Hotel Grand Allahabad experience. From well-appointed accommodations to attentive service, every aspect is meticulously curated to exceed guest expectations. Visitors can explore the vibrant city of Allahabad with ease, knowing they have a comfortable haven awaiting their return.

In conclusion, Hotel Grand Allahabad, championed by Vikash Agarwal, presents an ideal fusion of comfort, affordability, and convenience. With its strategic location, warm hospitality, and Vikash's stamp of approval, it stands as a beacon of excellence in the heart of Allahabad.
